```{r}
variable_gene_heatmap <- function (vsd.obj, num_genes = 500, annotation, title = "") {
  brewer_palette <- "RdBu"
  ramp <- colorRampPalette( RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(11, brewer_palette))
  mr <- ramp(256)[256:1]
  stabilized_counts <- assay(vsd.obj)
  row_variances <- rowVars(stabilized_counts)
  top_variable_genes <- stabilized_counts[order(row_variances, decreasing=T)[1:num_genes],]
  top_variable_genes <- top_variable_genes - rowMeans(top_variable_genes, na.rm=T)
  gene_names <- annotation$Gene.name[match(rownames(top_variable_genes), annotation$Gene.stable.ID)]
  rownames(top_variable_genes) <- gene_names
  coldata <- as.data.frame(vsd.obj@colData)
  coldata$sizeFactor <- NULL
  pheatmap::pheatmap(top_variable_genes, color = mr, annotation_col = coldata, fontsize_col = 8, fontsize_row = 250/num_genes, border_color = NA, main = title)
}

png(filename = "variable_gene_heatmap.png", 
    width = 1000, height = 1000, res = 300)  # adjust width/height as needed
```

```{r}
library(pheatmap)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(DESeq2)
library(dplyr)

DE_gene_heatmap <- function(res, count_matrix, padj_cutoff = 0.0001, ngenes = 20) {
  # Generate the color palette
  brewer_palette <- "RdBu"
  ramp <- colorRampPalette(RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(11, brewer_palette))
  mr <- ramp(256)[256:1]  # Reversed palette (blue to red)
  
  # Convert DESeqResults to data frame and get significant genes
  significant_genes <- as.data.frame(res) %>%
    filter(padj < padj_cutoff) %>%
    arrange(desc(log2FoldChange)) %>%
    head(ngenes)
  
  # Extract count data for significant genes
  heatmap_values <- count_matrix[rownames(significant_genes), ]  # Use row names (Ensembl IDs)
  
  # Add gene symbols as row names (assuming res has gene_symbol; adjust if needed)
  if ("gene_symbol" %in% colnames(res)) {
    rownames(heatmap_values) <- res[rownames(significant_genes), "gene_symbol"]
  } else {
    rownames(heatmap_values) <- rownames(significant_genes)  # Use Ensembl IDs if no symbols
  }
  
  # Scale rows for heatmap (z-score normalization)
  heatmap_values <- t(scale(t(heatmap_values)))
  
  # Plot the heatmap using pheatmap
  p <- pheatmap::pheatmap(heatmap_values,
                          color = mr,
                          scale = "none",  # Already scaled
                          cluster_rows = TRUE,
                          cluster_cols = TRUE,
                          fontsize_col = 10,
                          fontsize_row = max(6, 200/ngenes),  # Minimum font size of 6
                          border_color = NA,
                          main = paste("Top", ngenes, "DE Genes (padj <", padj_cutoff, ")"))
  
  # Return the pheatmap object
  return(invisible(p))
}
```

```{r}
plot_counts <- function (dds, gene, normalization = "DESeq2"){

  library(tibble)
  library(ggplot2)

  ann <- read.csv("GRCh38annotation.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

  # Standardize Ensembl IDs (remove version suffix)
  ann$Gene.stable.ID <- sub("\\..*$", "", ann$Gene.stable.ID)
  rownames(dds) <- sub("\\..*$", "", rownames(dds))

  # Choose normalized data
  if (normalization == "cpm") {
    if (!requireNamespace("edgeR", quietly=TRUE)) BiocManager::install("edgeR")
    normalized_data <- edgeR::cpm(counts(dds, normalized = FALSE))
  } else {
    normalized_data <- counts(dds, normalized = TRUE)
  }
  rownames(normalized_data) <- sub("\\..*$", "", rownames(normalized_data))

  condition <- dds$condition

  # Resolve gene -> ensembl_id
  if (is.numeric(gene)) {
    if (gene %% 1 != 0) stop("Invalid index supplied.")
    ensembl_id <- rownames(normalized_data)[gene]

  } else if (gene %in% ann$Gene.name) {
    hits <- which(ann$Gene.name == gene)
    ensembl_id <- ann$Gene.stable.ID[hits[1]]  # take first if duplicates

  } else if (gene %in% ann$Gene.stable.ID) {
    ensembl_id <- gene

  } else {
    stop("Gene not found in annotation. Check spelling.")
  }

  if (!ensembl_id %in% rownames(normalized_data)) {
    stop(paste0("Mapped gene '", gene, "' to ", ensembl_id,
                " but that Ensembl ID is not present in dds."))
  }

  expression <- as.numeric(normalized_data[ensembl_id, ])
  gene_name <- ann$Gene.name[match(ensembl_id, ann$Gene.stable.ID)]

  gene_tib <- tibble(condition = condition, expression = expression)

  ggplot(gene_tib, aes(x = condition, y = expression)) +
    geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA) +
    geom_point() +
    labs(title = paste0("Expression of ", gene_name, " - ", ensembl_id),
         x = "group",
         y = paste0("Normalized expression (", normalization , ")")) +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 11),
          axis.text.y = element_text(size = 11))
}

plot_counts(dds, "IGFBP1")
```

```{r}
lncap_ranked_df <- read.table("lncaprank.rnk",
                              header = TRUE,
                              sep = "\t",
                              stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
                              quote = "",
                              comment.char = "")

# 3) Standardize expected columns:
# Accepts either (Gene.name, log2FoldChange) OR common alternatives (Gene, gene, Symbol, score, stat, etc.)
colnames(lncap_ranked_df) <- trimws(colnames(lncap_ranked_df))

if (!("Gene.name" %in% colnames(lncap_ranked_df))) {
  gene_col <- intersect(colnames(lncap_ranked_df),
                        c("Gene.name", "Gene", "gene", "SYMBOL", "Symbol", "genesymbol", "Genesymbol"))
  if (length(gene_col) == 0) stop("Couldn't find a gene column. Expected e.g. 'Gene.name' or 'Gene'.")
  lncap_ranked_df$Gene.name <- lncap_ranked_df[[gene_col[1]]]
}

if (!("log2FoldChange" %in% colnames(lncap_ranked_df))) {
  score_col <- intersect(colnames(lncap_ranked_df),
                         c("log2FoldChange", "logFC", "stat", "score", "metric", "t", "rank"))
  if (length(score_col) == 0) stop("Couldn't find a ranking/score column. Expected e.g. 'log2FoldChange' or 'stat'.")
  lncap_ranked_df$log2FoldChange <- lncap_ranked_df[[score_col[1]]]
}

lncap_ranked_df <- lncap_ranked_df[, c("Gene.name", "log2FoldChange")]

# 4) Clean types + remove junk
lncap_ranked_df$Gene.name <- as.character(lncap_ranked_df$Gene.name)
lncap_ranked_df$log2FoldChange <- as.numeric(lncap_ranked_df$log2FoldChange)
lncap_ranked_df <- lncap_ranked_df[!is.na(lncap_ranked_df$Gene.name) &
                                     lncap_ranked_df$Gene.name != "" &
                                     !is.na(lncap_ranked_df$log2FoldChange), ]

# 5) Handle duplicate genes by averaging 
if (anyDuplicated(lncap_ranked_df$Gene.name) > 0) {
  lncap_ranked_df <- aggregate(log2FoldChange ~ Gene.name, data = lncap_ranked_df, FUN = mean)
}

# 6) Convert to named numeric vector (required by fgsea)
lncap_ranked_list <- tibble::deframe(lncap_ranked_df)

# 7) Sort decreasing (fgsea expects ranks ordered)
lncap_ranked_list <- sort(lncap_ranked_list, decreasing = TRUE)

head(lncap_ranked_list)

```

```{r}
waterfall_plot <- function (fsgea_results, graph_title) {
  fgsea_results %>% 
    mutate(short_name = str_split_fixed(pathway, "_",2)[,2])%>% # removes 'HALLMARK_' from the pathway title 
    ggplot( aes(reorder(short_name,NES), NES)) +
      geom_bar(stat= "identity", aes(fill = padj<0.05))+
      coord_flip()+
      labs(x = "Hallmark Pathway", y = "Normalized Enrichment Score", title = graph_title)+
      theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 7), 
            plot.title = element_text(hjust = 1))
}
library(stringr)
waterfall_plot(fgsea_results, "Hallmark pathways altered by hypoxia in LNCaP cells")
```
